staxel.village.dialogue.Mechanic.line:10: Hey, wanna give me a ha-
Hmm. Not sure I've seen ya around.
I'd shake yer 'and but I don't think ya'd appreciate the oil!
The name's ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop; though.
If y'ever have any crafting needs, I can help out!
Hmm? Is that yer ^c:d03e37;farm license^c:pop;?
I'm guessin' ^c:1486b0;{0-mayor_name}^c:pop; sent ya about the ^c:1486b0;barn^c:pop; then?
It's a bit of a task, but I figure it'll get ya familiar with workin' around here!
Wonderful work ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
That barn almos' brought a tear ta my eye!
If ya haven't been ta see him already, I think ^c:1486b0;{0-mayor_name}^c:pop; would love ta hear about it too!
I hope ta see more o' yer good work around the place!
Come back anytime ya need some materials from the store or some advice!
See, this here is a ^c:d03e37;marker^c:pop; designed ta plot out the land belongin' to the ^c:1486b0;barn^c:pop;.
They come in aaall shapes and sizes. Ya seen the ^c:d03e37;mailboxes^c:pop; around? Same deal.
Jus' shove 'er into the ground-makin' sure ya got the rotation right!-and you'll be on track in no time!
You can take a look at it anytime after that to get an idea of what's missin'!
HOWEVER! And keep this firmly in mind!
That ^c:1486b0;barn^c:pop; ain't gonna build itself. You gotta do that part yerself.
You'll have ta chop down trees fer ^c:d03e37;wood^c:pop;, turn 'em into blocks, and build it up bit by bit.
'Course, ya can always buy some o' the blocks at the ^c:1486b0;buildin' store^c:pop;.
Others parts might be a bit harder to come by...
Now off you trot. Go find a nice spot for that ^c:1486b0;barn^c:pop; and come back to me with some ^c:d03e37;wood^c:pop;!
An ^c:d03e37;axe^c:pop; oughta help out with that!
Once ya have the ^c:d03e37;wood^c:pop; in hand, I'll show ya how ta turn it inta more interestin' things!
Ready ta learn the ways o' the master builder?
It's actually pretty easy!
All ya need is three things: ingredients, a ^c:d03e37;blueprint or recipe^c:pop;, and ^c:d03e37;craftin' stations^c:pop;.
The stations ya need ta get the ^c:1486b0;barn^c:pop; done are all set up in the ^c:1486b0;buildin' store^c:pop; already.
Feel free ta borrow 'em anytime! Jus' don' try to run off with 'em...
When structures get vandalised... well we ain't gonna be usin' 'em 'till they're fixed.
Yer gonna need some ^c:d03e37;raw wood^c:pop; for this next bit!
Go chop down a few o' them big trees around the village!
So anyway.
This ^c:d03e37;blueprint^c:pop; will show ya how to make the basic ^c:d03e37;trough^c:pop; for the ^c:1486b0;barn^c:pop;.
I suspect ya already know how to make a few more basic blocks though.
Ya need to use the ^c:d03e37;blueprint^c:pop; in order ta memorise it.
Then ya can find it again anytime in the blueprint tab of yer inventory.
I'll give ya a moment ta do that. Talk to me again when yer all set!
With that outta the way, it's just a case o' putting the bits and pieces together!
Each step in the ^c:d03e37;blueprint^c:pop; uses a particular type o' ^c:d03e37;craftin' station^c:pop;.
If ya need ta ^c:d03e37;saw^c:pop; somethin', a ^c:d03e37;saw bench^c:pop; will do that for ye!
If ya wanna ^c:d03e37;assemble^c:pop; somethin', an ^c:d03e37;assembly station^c:pop; is the way to go!
Makes sense right?
Ya wanna set the items down on the left side o' the station. The final result ya take from the right!
Interactin' with the middle o' the station will usually set 'er goin'!
These should cover some o' the items needed ta make the ^c:d03e37;trough^c:pop;.
Start by usin' the ^c:d03e37;saw bench^c:pop; in the ^c:1486b0;buildin' store^c:pop; ta make some ^c:d03e37;lumber^c:pop;.
If memory serves, the ^c:1486b0;barn^c:pop; needs a couple o' ^c:d03e37;troughs^c:pop;, some walls, and a roof.
Once ya have all the parts, go finish off that ^c:1486b0;barn^c:pop;!
I'm sure I don't hafta remind ya how to build a good structure!
Jus' put down some blocks to make four nice walls.
Make sure ya don't forget the door or ya might run inta some problems...
Then cover it over with a solid roof of blocks to keep out the rain!
It really doesn't matter what type o' barn ya build. We don' have a solid blueprint!
Jus' keep most o' the structure inside the glowy bits and it'll be all good!
I'll be waitin' to hear all about it when yer done!
How's that ^c:1486b0;barn^c:pop; goin'?
Makin' good progress?
Come see me with yer ^c:d03e37;farm license^c:pop;.
You'll get it from ^c:1486b0;Farm Fan^c:pop;!
^c:1486b0;Mayor^c:pop; said ta give a good rundown on buildin' once ya had it.
Hmmm... didja lose yer ^c:d03e37;barn sign^c:pop;?
I can give ya a new one, but it'll cost ya {0-currency}{1-sign}...
Yes please!
Not right now.
Alrighty then!
Alrighty then!
Alrighty, here ya go!
I'm afraid ya can't afford that...
Maybe come back later?
Mmm... looks like the ^c:d03e37;{0-ttm}^c:pop; is missin'...
I can give ya a new one, but it'll cost ya {0-currency}{1-price}...
Yes please!
Not right now.
Alrighty, here ya go!
So m'store is in a bit o' trouble eh?
I can sell ya some bits to fix 'er up at a premium if ya need...
What can I do ya for?
Cash Register ({0-currency}{1-reg})
Shelves ({0-currency}{1-shelf})
Tiling Station ({0-currency}{1-tile})
Assembly Station ({0-currency}{1-assem})
Table Saw ({0-currency}{1-saw})
Counter ({0-currency}{1-counter})
Door ({0-currency}{1-door})
Nothing right now
Alrighty, here ya go!
Alrighty, here ya go!
Alrighty, here ya go!
Alrighty, here ya go!
Alrighty, here ya go!
Alrighty, here ya go!
Alrighty, here ya go!
Ya need some bits ta fix up the ^c:1486b0;grocery store^c:pop;?
Cash Register ({0-currency}{1-reg})
Shelves ({0-currency}{1-shelf})
Counter ({0-currency}{1-counter})
Nothing right now
Doin' alright, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;?
I've been thinkin' a lot recently...
My store could be doin' so much better.
If only there was less competition, if ya catch my drift...
Take out Leif? Got it.
...what?
Naw, don't get the wrong idea! ^c:1486b0;Leif^c:pop; is a good friend!
We ain't gonna do anythin' bad to him...'cept maybe steal some of his customers.
How are we gonna do that? Well, by stockin' up on all the stuff he has that we could!
Oh, and quite a few bits he doesn't!
I jus' need ya to expand the ^c:1486b0;buildin' store^c:pop; a bit so we can stock 'em!
How's the whole expansion thing goin'?
We're gonna blow ^c:1486b0;Leif^c:pop; outta the water!
It's always impressive how quick ya get that stuff done, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
I swear, I jus' gotta blink and suddenly the work's all done!
Maybe I'm jus' too used to the ol' style of contractors...
Now, the job itself may be the main reward, but I thought I'd give ya a little somethin' extra!
Let's see how well ^c:1486b0;Leif^c:pop; does at outshinin' us now, eh?
Hm? You wanna know about ^c:1486b0;Rosie's^c:pop; ol' rabbit?
'Fraid I wasn't in the neighbourhood back then...
^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;, I hate to be the one to say this, but yer buildin' too much!
At this rate, I'm never gonna be able to keep up with yer demand for resources!
We jus' don' have the supplies...
Now...if ya'd be willin' to help with tha', we might be able to change things for the better!
How about ya start with a quick survey of the island as a whole?
Jus' run around a bit an' bring me ^c:d03e37;50 raw stone^c:pop; an' ^c:d03e37;50 raw wood^c:pop;.
See if ya can find some promisin' sources!
Any luck findin' us some new sources o' raw materials?
Jus' wander a bit and see if ya can find a good place to get ^c:d03e37;50 raw stone^c:pop; an' ^c:d03e37;50 raw wood^c:pop;.
Ah, so ya did manage to find some untapped sources, did ya? That's good to hear.
Now, I can't exactly ask ya to bring all the materials in yerself. That'd be too much work!
So what I want ya to do is take each o' these ^c:d03e37;markers^c:pop; and use 'em to designate a resource.
Some o' them need trees, some need open quarries.
Once they're all marked up, I can start plannin' better ways o' sourcin' 'em.
Jus' lemme know when it's all set up!
Looks like we're missin' a few more resource spots.
Ya jus' gotta place them ^c:d03e37;markers^c:pop; next to trees or quarries as the marker says and make sure they're valid!
There ya are, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
Jus' got word that some 'o my people are preparin' to work with those resources, ya marked!
Good work out there!
Seems like we're gonna be pretty good on materials for a while now!
This' jus' a li'l somethin' as thanks fer savin' the business again!
Even if ya were the one who put it at risk in the first place!
The time has come, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
We're gonna beat out my good-for-nothin' ex-husband for monopoly of all the islands in the region!
It was my store that got 'im that big tradin' conglomerate in the first place!
But it ain't gonna be easy. Not by far.
I got a multi-step plan that's guaranteed to succeed, but a whole lot of it rests on yer shoulders!
See, the biggest barrier to dominatin' the other islands is how much we can ship in an' outta the island.
The bottleneck there is all in the ^c:1486b0;airship dock^c:pop;...
If ya could expand both sides a bit, it'd be a great first step to ownin' the whole region!
This should give ya a good idea about how to proceed!
Still workin' on the ^c:1486b0;airship dock^c:pop;?
Hard work, I'd imagine, eh? Yer doin' good though! Fantastic even!
Good work, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! Ya really nailed the expansion!
Already got a bunch o' airships inbound to start ferryin' goods more efficiently!
Trouble is...our airships aren't exactly the fastest out there...
We're somethin' like 10-20% behind in terms o' speed compared to our competitors...
Ya think ya could work somethin' up to fix the issue? Maybe some fancy new parts or somethin'?
This here is an idea I had...but I ain't exactly figured out all the specifics...
Maybe ya could run it on by ^c:1486b0;Cecile^c:pop;? Heard she was all big on science-like stuff.
Could ya run that plan on by ^c:1486b0;Cecile^c:pop;?
She might have some ideas on how to make it work.
No dice, huh?
Dunno why ^c:1486b0;Cecile^c:pop; is so stuck on magic not bein' real...
Too many hours in the books, maybe?
But if it's magic we need...maybe ya wanna go say hi to ^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop;?
She seems pretty in the know about magic, right?
We need some magic, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
Go see if ^c:1486b0;Cirahna's^c:pop; willin' to help!
Better luck this time, I hope?
Mmm... Yea, that makes more sense!
Alright, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! Ya up for a little craftin' work?
We're gonna need two sets 'o ^c:d03e37;airship parts^c:pop; to get the things movin' faster!
Don' worry too much about the instructions! It ain't as scary as it looks!
Jus' do it one step at a time and yer gonna be fine!
Remember, we need two o' the ^c:1486b0;weird magic airship parts^c:pop; to make these things fly!
Bring 'em on over as soon as yer done!
These are perfect, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
Couldn't have made a better prototype myself!
Now that just leaves one last teeny thing...
See, the key to beatin' out that ol' thief's monopoly is bestin' 'im at 'is own game!
We're gonna need somethin' to intercept all 'is communications an' beat 'im to the punch!
Go set that up somewhere outside the village and I'll get these airships into production!
That ^c:1486b0;communications tower^c:pop; is gonna be the key to our success!
Make sure ya set it up somewhere it'll get good reception!
Although, on this island, I suppose that's just about anywhere!
Already got some communications comin' in! Good work, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! I knew I could count on ya!
We're gonna dominate the market in no time! Maybe I'll even manage to buy my ol' business back from that greedy ol'...
Anyhow, I hafta thank ya again, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;. This wouldn't have been possible without ya!
This is jus' a li'l token of my admiration for ya. And my undying thanks!
If yer ever lookin' for someone to help around yer home, I'd always be willin'!
Jus' come on by an' say the word!
Oh, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! How fares th' ^c:1486b0;farm^c:pop;?
^c:d03e37;Campaign signboards^c:pop;...?
Ol' ^c:1486b0;Oscar^c:pop; put ya up to this one, didn't he?
Did he really think I'd believe ya 'ad political ambitions? Ha.
This 'ere will tell ya how ta make 'em.
Good luck with that! An' don' go gettin' sucked in too deep...
Eh? What's this? A ^c:d03e37;broom^c:pop;?
What is ol' ^c:1486b0;Oscar^c:pop; up to this time...?
He better not be thinkin' any o' this is my fault...
Construction's all lookin' pretty good!
Ya did some nice work layin' the groundwork for us out there, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
Sure did make the job much easier on us!
Nice ta see ya ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! How's it goin'?
Ol' ^c:1486b0;{0-max}^c:pop; sent ya over did he?
A new idea ta bring money ta the town? Sounds pretty fancy!
Shouldn' be any problems on our end. Jus' run this ^c:1486b0;signpost^c:pop; back to 'im.
Then we're probably good ta go!
